name: Power Bot (Ancaria Nova, MartinLagman)
description:
This is our first game together, made for the "Mini Jam 73: Power", by me and my friend MartinLagman (added as contributor). Sorry for the remaining bugs! We will probably update the game next week to correct them, and to add and complete the minimum gameplay objectives that we planned for this game.

We are learning so we appreciate any feedback you can give us :)

TecnoMagos: AncariaNova and MartinLagman.

Music by TecnoMagos.

Credits for external assets:

Palette (we added white to it):

"Nymbh GB Palette" by Kerrie Lake

Sprites  (changed palette colors)

Main character sprite: "Droid Zapper" (in "Sci Fi character pack 6") by https://penusbmic.itch.io/

Sprite atlas for tiles and enemies:

Space Base Platform Shooter 8-bit Art Graphics Pack

by sitebender

https://sitebender.itch.io/space-base-platform-shooter-8-bit-art-graphics-pack
